Lab 3 Instruction:
Serverless Functions

Durham College - SEIT

Ramiyan Gangatharan

100835223

Web Development: Frameworks

navigate here

NOTE: this is a writeup for our plans for Assignment 3, there is no implementation yet.

Requirements

You will modify your 11ty project, powered by a headless CMS, by adding a serverless function to provide some kind of dynamic information.

Your Project Will Demonstrate

  • Serverless Functions:
    You'll write serverless functions using JavaScript or TypeScript. These functions handle backend logic and can interact with APIs, databases, or other services.

  • Asynchronous Programming:
    Managing asynchronous requests and responses, such as fetching data or processing user input.

  • Dynamic Content Handling:
    Incorporating dynamic content fetched by serverless functions into your static site.

  • State Management:
    Managing state in your application, especially when dealing with content that changes based on user interaction or external data.

Documentation

You will provide documentation that covers all key aspects of the project and offers guidance on how to maintain it. If the scope of the project has significantly shifted since Lab 1, this is not necessarily a problem, but you must indicate how and why.

Links
